channel.title: Need serious help with pickup command

item.title: Need serious help with pickup command
item.dc:creator: @MasterofPK MasterofPK
item.description:
@MasterofPK wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); }

Read full topic
item.source: Need serious help with pickup command

@bonzakid wrote:

frogtamer101:

Ouch pretty noobish go easy with me well it had a //pickup so i didnt know if it was. This is a really blank server and im wanting to add a pickup command could you help please

That is a case for the pickup of items on the ground in the server.
Just leave it how it is…
Although, I don’t have the pickup code.

item.title: Need serious help with pickup command
item.dc:creator: @frogtamer101 frogtamer101
item.description:
@frogtamer101 wrote:

Ok I have a server completly blank and I don’t know if i have the pickup command. I don’t think so this is all I could find.

[code] case 236: //pickup item
int itemY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
int itemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
int itemX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
if(playerRights == 0){message(“ADMIN RESPONSE: pickupItem: “+itemX+”,”+itemY+" itemID: "+itemID);}
pickUpItem(itemID,1);

			break;

[/code]
I changed the rights incase it was it and it didnt work
Help would be much appreciated

I also would enjoy commands to make a pure ranger and mager and combats but only for admins??

Read full topic
item.source: Need serious help with pickup command
